nodes.text: Kamka Lira was a female individual who was the proprietor of The Jewels of Bith in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu.

Kamka Lira was created as part of the backstory for the Jewels of Bith store in the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge theme park land, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. While the official backstory specifies that the character is female, the Star Wars: Datapad mobile application pictures a bearded individual with the name "Kamka" discussing the importation of jewels. The 2020 reference book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by Cole Horton, confirms Lira's gender as female.
